CustomField.description:
Fields string used to sort the children of a node. It can contain one or more fields along with the order of sort.
field1 => order by field1 ASC field1~field2 => order by field1 ASC, field2 ASC field1#ASC~field2 => order by field1 ASC, field2 ASC field1#DESC~field2 => order by field1 DESC, field2 ASC field1~field2#DESC => order by field1 ASC, field2 DESC field1#DESC~field2#DESC => order by field1 DESC, field2 DESC
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Fields used to sort the children of a node. Use ~ as separator when using multiple fields.
CustomField.label: Order Children By
